channel.title: RunesZone 24/7 Server 99.9% Uptime Double Xp Weekends & Squeal of Fortune
channel.description:
[img]http://runeszone.com/img/title2/logo.png[/img]
[center][b]Double XP Every Weekend 00:00AM BST Friday Until Sunday 00:00AM BST[/b] [/center]
Brand new server
Website [url=http://runeszone.com]http://runeszone.com[/url] Client Player [url=http://runeszone.com/client/]http://runeszone.com/client/[/url]
Server Features:
NEW *squeal of fortune* 4 Daily spins many rare items added Core re-work for great server stability Friendly and active community Duo Slayer Dwarf multi cannon In game PvP highscores Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding Flawless combat system Client settings - Including 100% fullscreen & resizeable A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits All skills fully working and being worked on every day Daily server and website updates A hard working owner who listens to his players Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops Many bosses to defeat all dropping well rewarding items! Clean and efficient client, small cache size and low memory usage Many mini-games including fully working duel arena with staking The server is hosted on a powerful VPS which is ran 24/7 for 100% uptime Fast combat XP rates so you can get right in and pk Max cape for players who accomplish all 99's Highscores and auto donations And many, many more features join today to see them for your self!
Why should you choose to play runeszone server?
A very good question.. But a very simple answer which is, RunesZone cares about it's players, it cares about it's economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do everything we possible can to ensure that the players of RunesZone enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!
The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on RunesZone on the update-log on the forums. RunesZone focuses on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of game-play that we know players enjoy PvM, PvP, skilling, you name it we have it! We are not like other servers which are ignorant to there players and just ignores there opinions and even ignores there players when they talk to them.. I have played over 50 servers over the past 4 years and have watched very carefully how the best servers are ran and also how the bad servers are ran, I have learnt there mistakes and adapted to how the best servers are ran which is why RunesZone is the place for you. [size=24pt][b] WE ARE CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR STAFF [/b][/size]
[img]http://runeszone.com/image1.gif[/img] [img]http://runeszone.com/image2.gif[/img] [img]http://runeszone.com/image3.gif[/img] [img]http://runeszone.com/image4.gif[/img]

item.title: RunesZone 24/7 Server 99.9% Uptime Double Xp Weekends & Squeal of Fortune
item.dc:creator: @runeszonecom runeszonecom
item.description:
@runeszonecom wrote:

I would like to add to the comments being posted about the current issue found on running a scan i would like to reassure you that playing runeszone is 100% safe and your game id is protected. We are looking into the issue raised and hope to provide a update on this shortly.

Regards
RunesZone

Read full topic

also the image displayed is asking you to activate your plugin. Have you got the latest java installed also if you are using firefox the browser needs a additional plugin.

all the best

[center]Double XP Every Weekend 00:00AM BST Friday Until Sunday 00:00AM BST [/center]
